attributes.action: Scrap all university fees for students.
attributes.background: The current university fees that students are paying for an education is simply outrageous. If university fees are abolished then all students can take comfort in the fact they leave university debt free.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104787

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
